OrgName.entry: CROSSPOOL AND DISTRICT YOUTH SPORTS TRUST (CDYST)

Desc.entry: Charitable sports trust providing sporting and recreational facilities. Priority given to local youth. Resources include sports hall with kitchen and meeting room for hire, mini soccer pitch and knock-about-pitch, 2 tennis courts and children's play area for under 10's.

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 10
